metadata.title: CVE-2021-21142 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Use after free in Payments in Google Chrome on Mac prior to 88.0.4324.146allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform a sandbox escape via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
